recipe.title: Strawberry Breakfast Muffins Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; greek yogurt, room temperature ; (140 g)
3 tablespoons ; coconut oil, melted, plus more for greasing

steps.step: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, yogurt, honey, strawberries, and coconut oil until well combined.
Add the flour, baking powder, and salt, and fold the batter together using a rubber spatula. Stop folding once all of the dry ingredients have disappeared into the batter.
Using a medium ice cream scoop, pour one scoop full of batter into each well of a greased muffin tin.
Bake for for 20-25 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the center of a muffin comes out clean.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, yogurt, honey, strawberries, and coconut oil until well combined.
Add the flour, baking powder, and salt, and fold the batter together using a rubber spatula.
Stop folding once all of the dry ingredients have disappeared into the batter.
Using a medium ice cream scoop, pour one scoop full of batter into each well of a greased muffin tin.
Bake for for 20-25 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the center of a muffin comes out clean.
